name: Bob The Tourist (Cold Tea Games)
description:
We play as Bob, a tourist who got lost in the jungle. He encounters a strange frog and while distracted accidentally starts a forest fire. Now he has to outrun the fire while avoiding dangerous hazards in the jungle.

This project was our team's entry for a game jam. As the game designer of the project, I got inspired by Unfair Mario.

We didn't have enough time to add the final cutscene at the end of the game so we used a placeholder text.

Note: Yes the frog is Pepe :)

Credits:

Batuhan Atamal - Game/Level Designer

Utku Irtem - Developer/2D Artist

Ozan Ozenir - 2D Artist
